text: Porphyrobacter neustonensis is a pleomorphic and aerobic bacteria from the genus of Porphyrobacter which has been isolated from a freshwater pond in Brisbane in Australia. == References == == Further reading == * * ==External links== *Type strain of Porphyrobacter neustonensis at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingomonadales Category:Bacteria described in 1993
title: Porphyrobacter neustonensis
